flavor:
"What do we want?" "CHAOS!"
 "When do we want it?"
 "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"
howToEarnGolden: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Demon Hunter.
name: Chaos Strike
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Draw a card.

flavor: Undisputed champions of "Dancing with the Satyrs."
howToEarnGolden: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Demon Hunter.
name: Coordinated Strike

flavor: Illin' Illidan laying down the damage, flinging out the chaos as far as he can manage.
howToEarnGolden: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Demon Hunter.
name: Chaos Nova

flavor: What he lacks in sight, he makes up for in sleight-of-tentacle tricks.

name: Sightless Watcher
text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your deck. Choose one to put on top.

flavor: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.

name: Battlefiend
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.

flavor:
If throwing glaives is what you crave; 
summon tokens and make 'em broken.

name: Wrathscale Naga
text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

flavor: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

name: Raging Felscreamer
text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.

flavor: Nothing fills you up like soul food!
howToEarnGolden: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Demon Hunter.
name: Feast of Souls
text: Draw a card for each friendly minion that died this turn.

flavor: As the humble caterpillar becomes a beautiful butterfly, so too does a demon hunter become a hideous mass of writhing destruction and unfettered chaos.

name: Metamorphosis
text: Swap your Hero Power to "Deal 4 damage." After 2 uses, swap it back.

flavor: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.

flavor: "Pick a card, any card! Preferably the left- or right-most card."

name: Kor'vas Bloodthorn
